title: When Darkness Falls: Kiss Of The WolfShadow KissingThe Devil She Knew
description: A trio of spellbinding love stories includes Tanith Lee's Shadow Kissing, in which Artist Vivien Gray and her enigmatic lover, who is cloaked in darkness, unleash an unimaginable evil with their fiery passion, as well as works by Susan Krinard and Evelyn Vaughn. Original.
author: Susan Krinard
